To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.comFrom: orbhunterx@...=
Date: Mon, 3 Dec 2007 20:05:03 +0000Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: Spiraling out of=
 control- Enough of the namecalling and fighting!!




How about Boxonians =
or Boxnicks? Lance--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, lisby@... wrote:>> > "Box=
ology"? I like it!> > Ann> > > -----Original Message-----> >From: Frank Sum=
ption <franks-boxes@...>> >Sent: Dec 3, 2007 10:13 AM> >To: evp-itc@yahoogr=
oups.com> >Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Spiraling out of control- Enough of the n=
amecalling and fighting!!> >> >> > Yeah, I am the master! But... that's onl=
y when the Ol' Lady ain't looking over my shoulder! I have to tell everyone=
--she's pissed!!!! Way too much time in the basement, and way to much money=
 spent on something she considers useless. I'm rushing on yet another proto=
 type, one that gets rid of random mode, and has all functions, linear, wit=
h direct voice mode, or though a sound chamber. Then---it's time to play wi=
th tones. > > > > Random mode, depsite the professed theory out there, no l=
onger works for me, maybe it's psychological, but the damn circuits won't e=
ven function. Random in the #24 box would not work at all at the Stanley, s=
o I' am abandoning that function. I know what Moon claims about the raw hav=
ing to be random--simply not true, that was based on my assumptions about h=
ow the box worked in the early days of boxology. "> > > > Frank-S> >> >> >T=
o: EVP-ITC@...: bulletbabea@...: Sun, 2 Dec 2007 18:26:41 -0800Subject: Re:=
 [EVP-ITC] Spiraling out of control- Enough of the namecalling and fighting=
!!> >> >> >> >> >> >To ALL members of this group,> >I agree with Steve. Ive=
 told you all this many times yet some of you like to get caught up in the =
heat of the moment.> > > >It is very disturbing to watch you all try to win=
 this war of words. There is no winner just a bunch of losers. And while yo=
u are busy losing theres no GOOD research being performed by YOU.> > > >How=
 much research did YOU do today? How much time did you spend firing off rep=
lies to attempt to respond to someone you dont even know about something th=
at doesnt even involve YOU? How much time did you spend replying to join in=
 the arguments you feel do involve YOU?> > > >The point being, this is a re=
search group for ITC not a boxing room and definitely your own personal bat=
tlegrounds. Take that elsewhere. Healthy discussion is one thing but I have=
 seen very few people offering that. In fact I know a few of you joined her=
e just to go after someone who ticked you off. Then there are those who jus=
t seem to be firing in all directions, taget doesnt matter.> > > >Get a gri=
p people!! Ive seen 4 year olds with more self control. If you arent intere=
sted in researching ITC for yourself then what the heck are YOU doing HERE.=
 > > > >ONCE AGAIN THIS IS AN ITC RESEARCH GROUP!! > > > >As for the box Fr=
ank is and always has been the first/primary tester of any box he has built=
. > > > >lol> >Misty> > > >P.S. I think you all are capable of finding bett=
er things to do, if not let me know and I will give you a few ideas =3D)> >=
Steve Hultay <urkel23@...> wrote:> >> >> >I think we should all focus at th=
e research at hand and forget what everyone else is doing. I personally kno=
w Chris and think he's a great guy and frank feels the same way most days. =
This has gotten to the point where i can't even do a session anymore becaus=
e i'm so blocked by negative thoughts from this group it's pointless to con=
centrate on the box and get results. Honestly who cares what chris does any=
way, does it really affect everyone's lives that much. I have a job and thi=
s is a hobby that i used to really like, but now this board has brought me =
down. It seems all people want to do is make this like a street fight with =
challenges and negative views and for what reason? If anyone is concerned a=
bout hearing Chris's audio, i have about 2 hours of box sessions from Easte=
rn State on my web site for all to listen to. It's www.keyportparanormal.co=
m and go to investigation and click on eastern state. All the audio is at t=
he bottom of that page and you guys can judge for yourself and i heard a lo=
t come out of that box that night personally because i repeated a lot of st=
uff back to chris that i heard. Enough already, let's move on to the next g=
reat thing. That radio shack hack was a great breakthrough here, let's just=
 be happy we got that before it was shut down. Now we have another avenue t=
o go down, but we can't do it with all these negatives out there. Let's mov=
e on to new topics and anyone out there that bought a Radio Shack box, star=
t sharing your files with the group so it's not just us same 5 that post al=
l the time.-Steve H.> >> >> >Be a better sports nut! Let your teams follow =
you with Yahoo Mobile. Try it now. > > > >> >> >> >> >> >> >_______________=
___________________________________________> >Connect and share in new ways=
 with Windows Live.> >http://www.windowslive.com/connect.html?ocid=3DTXT_TA=
